Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1003.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Three more days pass, and at last, your body has fully recovered.'}
{3: "Under Vonnegut's watchful gaze, you step into the crimson Hetero Tower once more."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory659.jpg'}
{3: 'Alone, dodging Hetero-Creatures and Red Tide within the Hetero Tower, you finally return to the starting point after a long, grueling journey.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory661.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory662.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4801_30.jpg'}
{3: 'Before you stands that same silhouette marred with wounds.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "You're back."}
{2: 'How is Chaos doing?', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "I've managed to repair much of her damage."}
{3: 'Just as the <color=#ff4e4eff>outside</color> Vonnegut said, the Vonnegut here will surely repair Chaos.'}
{3: "Soft footsteps approach. Looking down, you see the doll's face, still wearing that unchanging expression."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Are you alright?', 3: '42'}
{3: 'She nods gently.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You bend down to meet her gaze. For the first time, those once-vacant eyes now show a glimmer of emotion.'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Why did you come back...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Are you... still going to do this... Have you still... made the same choice?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Chaos' gaze slowly drops downward, eventually moving back upon you."}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "I can hold on a bit longer. There's no rush to decide now—Agent Zero hasn't come back yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: "No, I haven't given up. I came back because I have a new plan.", 3: '51'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'A new plan?'}
{3: 'Even while fending off the spikes, Vonnegut keenly catches your whispered words.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'What are you planning?'}
{2: '(Share the plan with them)', 3: '56'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'A gamble... hah...'}
{3: 'His voice brims with impatience, for enduring prolonged torment leaves no soul untouched.'}

{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Very well, I'll take the gamble. The Hetero Tower's core remaining in the Fog is indeed a risk, but regardless of the outcome, I will leave and stop standing guard before this rift."}
{3: "Chaos' gaze is lowered, whether from weariness or a reluctance to meet your eye, you cannot tell."}
{2: "At least I've fought with everything I have.", 3: '64'}
{2: "Besides, victory or defeat won't be determined until our battle reaches its end.", 3: '65'}
{3: 'Chaos raises her gaze momentarily, yet as if a sudden recollection strikes, her already dim pupils retreat back into a hollow abyss.'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Are you sure about this?', 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't trust me?", 3: '68', 4: 'I trust Lucia.', 5: '69'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "...So you defeat Vonnegut, and I gain Agent Zero's authority, then what?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "The problem remains unsolved. The mission bound to that authority will corrupt me in return, and I'll lose myself just like Cradle did.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Even if I can suppress it for now, one day eventually...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Before that day comes, I'll return with a solution.", 3: '73'}
{2: 'We have the core, and all this intelligence to work with.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Asimov, other Construct squads, and Babylonia...', 3: '75'}
{2: 'All I need to do now is bring the core back and buy time for everyone.', 3: '76'}
{3: 'Just as Chaos is about to speak again, a cold warning suddenly cuts through the air, emanating from the figure nearby.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Now that a decision has been made, there should be a sense of urgency. Agent Zero might return at any given moment.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Using the Bridge Across Dreams won't just help us find Lucia but also let Cradle track us down."}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Keep dawdling like this, and your absurd plan will be dead in the water before you can even test it.'}
{2: 'The "you" outside Hetero Tower have already said the same thing.', 3: '82'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Let's get started, then."}
{3: "Beneath his urgent pressing rests an unvoiced truth, one that eludes the listener's notice entirely."}
{3: 'The rift before him trembles ever so faintly as countless indistinct whispers echo through the space like murmurs from a haunting nightmare...'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{3: 'In this grey, hazy realm, a faint buzzing sound persists, the last remaining proof that Lucia is still alive.'}
{3: 'She no longer cares to count the years she has endured, her body and memories now worn ragged by the ceaseless erosion of time.'}
{3: 'Running has lost all meaning. No matter how far she pushes forward, the scenery around her remains forever unchanged.'}
{3: 'That faint glimmer of hope lies eternally out of reach. Perhaps it was nothing but a false lure from the very beginning.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Her futile running slowly comes to a halt, and Lucia collapses to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Her eyes, now nearly melded with the Fog, stay locked on the churning cube clasped in her hand.'}
{3: 'SHING—'}
{3: 'Silently, her fingers tighten, pressing against the "Key" that holds the core within.'}
{3: 'The buzzing cuts off abruptly—and with it, the last trace of discord in this deathly silence vanishes.'}
{3: 'Within this eternity, she finally accepts the future she has long since foreseen.'}
{3: 'Her voice dissipates into the Fog, leaving only the silent movement of her lips.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I\'ve hidden too many things... about both the choice and the price of using the "Key"...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She speaks these words to herself in silence.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'At least... let me keep our final promise, and see you one last time...', 4: '1'}
{3: "As she speaks to herself, the port at the back of her neck opens, exposing the circuits that connect to her frame's core."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I miss you so much. I really want to return to you and everyone...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The "Key" emits another solitary buzz as Lucia, with unwavering determination, guides it towards the port.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...No matter what, I will keep my promise and return this core to you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bowing her head, she places her hand over her chest, fingers delicately tracing the Gray Raven emblem—a silent oath to her companions.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You will all survive this, I promise.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'CLINK—'}
{3: 'A luminous glow envelops her form as the power of the "Key" surges through every part of the Pyroath frame. The perpetually quiet Fog at last breaks its silence.'}
{3: "Lucia raises her head, clenching her fist and pressing it firmly against the emblem, as if sharing a long-distance fist bump with her fellow Gray Ravens whom she hasn't seen for so long."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And this price... I alone will pay it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1013.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'As if responding to her resolve, a rift silently emerges amidst the surging fog.'}
